verses.verse: A Psalm of thanksgiving. Make a joyful <S%H7321>noise<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, all ye <S%H776>lands<s%>.

Know <S%H3045><s%> ye that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, he is <S%H430>God<s%>: It is he that hath <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5971>us<s%>, and we are his; We are his people, and the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of his <S%H4830>pasture<s%>.

Enter <S%H935><s%> into his <S%H8179>gates<s%> with <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%>, And into his <S%H2691>courts<s%> with <S%H8416>praise<s%>: Give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H1288>him<s%>, and bless his <S%H8034>name<s%>.
For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%>; His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, And his <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> unto <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
